eya sadewaka lokayage apramana wandanawata lakwu aithihasika siddhasthanayaki.sanskruthiya, aagamadahama, akshara, murthi, katayam aadi kala shilpayanhida aarambhaka sthanaya mihinthalawayi.budupiyanan wahansela sathara namakage pahasa lada mihinthalawa athipujaniya shreshta pinbimaki.dewanampiyathissa, uththiya, bhathikabhaya, wasabha kanitta thissa, gotabhaya, jettathissa, sirimewan, dhathusena, palamuwana agbo, dewana agbo aadi raja raja mahamathyadin wisin ee ee yugayanhidi mihinthala pudabimehi karawana lada wehera wihara, pokunu, pawuru, piriwen rohal aadi wiwidha wu pujaniya wasthungen mihinthalaya samanwitha we.eda maharahathan wahansela dolos dahasak wada siti wihara, piriwen, dana shala, ata satak len mihinthalawe pawathi bawa prakata karunaki.panchashila prathipadawa, pawidda, upasampadawa waswasima aarambha wuye mihinthalaya mulkaragenaya.
